name: DAINO RUN
description:
An awesome game for the WOWIE JAM 4.0 !

In this 2D platformer you are a person with a  dinosaur who follows you by doing everything you do but with delay. Try to beat all three levels !

Controls:

A: move left; D: move right; SPACE: jump

in menus: arrow keys and space/enter

Disclaimer:

The web version has a bug and crashes if you or the dino dies. So if you want to play it further, please download the game (windows or linux).

this game was made by Madelaine21 and quabmara
